captions.text: Hi and welcome to a new video!
Today, we will review the adidas F50 adizero in the Champions League colourway.
If you want to win the boots, simply watch the whole review!
Enjoy the video!
I was totally satisfied with the comfort of the boot.
It's also a little bit more comfortable than the 2013 F50 Samba model.
A big improvement is the softer and more comfortable heel (cushioned material).
The material is a bit thicker compared to previous F50 versions.
Still, the F50 is one of the lightest boots available on the market.
Overall, the feel for the ball was very good.
This is mainly caused by the thin and flexible upper.
Although the material feels a bit thicker compared to the 2013 F50 Samba versions
I still think that the boots deserve a 5 of 5 rating.
I've been testing the boots for over 3 months now.
I didn't have any problems during this testing period and they are still in good condition.
The F50 is a quality boot and I hardly found any stress marks.
Still, there is one more thing I should mention.
The material is thinner compared to non "speed-boots" e.g. Predator Instinct
This is why the F50 can't have the durability of solid boots which have a thicker upper.
Nevertheless, I'm satisfied with the quality and durability of the F50.
Let's come to the final rating of the F50 adizero.
The boot satisfied me in all categories.
It's one of the lightest football boots on the market.
It still has a great comfort and fit.
Also the quality and durability was absolutely satisfying.
However, if I had to choose between the synthetic F50 and the leather version
I would go for the F50 leather because of the softer upper
the better comfort and the better touch (in my opinion).
Still, I was surprised how good the synthetic F50 actually are.
This is why I rate the boot with 9.5 out of 10 points.
Now it's time for the giveaway!
You follow two simple steps to enter the giveaway.
1. Rate this video and share it (would be nice).
2. Answer the following question in the comments...
Who is your favorite F50 football player?
Write your answer in the comment section below.
Also mention why this player is your favourite.
I will randomly pick out one of your comments.
The winner will receive a Youtube message in about 4-5 weeks.
I hope you enjoyed the review!
Stay sporty and see you next time! #Konzi

title: Testing Gareth Bale & Rodriguez Boots: F50 Adizero Test & Review | freekickerz
